uk.co.saiman.experiment

Interface ExperimentManager


  • public interface ExperimentManager
    API for experiment management, i.e. registration and discovery of experiment types, and registration of root experiment parts such that experiment part trees can be built.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addExperimentType(ExperimentType<?,?,?> childType) 
      <C,O> ExperimentPart<C,Instrument,O> addRootExperiment(ExperimentType<C,Instrument,O> rootType)
      Add a root experiment node of the given type to management.
      boolean addRootExperimentType(ExperimentType<?,Instrument,?> rootType)
      Register an available root experiment type
      void execute(ExperimentPart<?,Instrument,?> experimentRoot)
      Execute the experiment tree at the given root.
      Set<ExperimentPart<?,Instrument,?>> getRootExperiments() 
      Set<ExperimentType<?,Instrument,?>> getRootExperimentTypes() 
      boolean removeExperimentType(ExperimentType<?,?,?> childType) 
      boolean removeRootExperiment(ExperimentPart<?,Instrument,?> rootPart)
      Remove the given root experiment node from management.
      boolean removeRootExperimentType(ExperimentType<?,Instrument,?> rootType)
      Unregister an available root experiment type
      List<ExperimentPart<?,?,?>> state()
      Get the current processing state of the experiment manager.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute(ExperimentPart<?,Instrument,?> experimentRoot)
        Execute the experiment tree at the given root.
        Parameters:
        experimentRoot - The root of the experiment tree to execute

      • state

        List<ExperimentPart<?,?,?>> state()
        Get the current processing state of the experiment manager.
        Returns:
        The current state, in the form of the stack of all currently executing experiment parts

      • getRootExperimentTypes

        Set<ExperimentType<?,Instrument,?>> getRootExperimentTypes()
        Returns:
        All known available root experiment types

      • addRootExperimentType

        boolean addRootExperimentType(ExperimentType<?,Instrument,?> rootType)
        Register an available root experiment type
        Parameters:
        rootType - A possible root experiment type
        Returns:
        True if the type was added successfully, false otherwise

      • removeRootExperimentType

        boolean removeRootExperimentType(ExperimentType<?,Instrument,?> rootType)
        Unregister an available root experiment type
        Parameters:
        rootType - A possible root experiment type
        Returns:
        True if the type was removed successfully, false otherwise

      • getRootExperiments

        Set<ExperimentPart<?,Instrument,?>> getRootExperiments()
        Returns:
        All registered root experiment parts

      • addRootExperiment

        <C,O> ExperimentPart<C,Instrument,O> addRootExperiment(ExperimentType<C,Instrument,O> rootType)
        Add a root experiment node of the given type to management.
        Parameters:
        rootType - The type of experiment
        Returns:
        A new root experiment part of the given type

      • removeRootExperiment

        boolean removeRootExperiment(ExperimentPart<?,Instrument,?> rootPart)
        Remove the given root experiment node from management.
        Parameters:
        rootPart - The experiment part
        Returns:
        True if the part was removed successfully, false otherwise
